description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProjectCard' that renders detailed information about a Jira project, including icons, avatar, description, project type, lead, privacy, category, and metrics.

methods.name: ProjectCard
methods.description: React functional component that displays information about a Jira project with styling and interactivity.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an emoji icon based on the project type key.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Constructs the URL to the Jira project's page based on the domain and project key.
